title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the target audience, learning objectives, and desired features for the interactive course.

title: Design Course Structure and Content
description: Plan the overall structure of the course, including modules, lessons, and project scenarios. Outline the content and learning materials for each section.

title: Develop Interactive Learning Platform
description: Design and implement the interactive learning platform that will host the course content and project scenarios.

title: Create Project Scenarios and Exercises
description: Develop realistic project scenarios and exercises that simulate version control challenges and provide hands-on learning experiences.

title: Implement Version Control Integration
description: Integrate the interactive learning platform with popular version control systems (e.g., Git, Mercurial, Subversion) to enable seamless interaction and real-time feedback.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Create an intuitive and engaging user interface for the interactive learning platform, ensuring a smooth learning experience for users.

title: Implement User Authentication and Progress Tracking
description: Develop a secure user authentication system and implement progress tracking mechanisms to allow users to save their progress and resume the course at a later time.

title: Conduct Usability Testing and Refinement
description: Perform usability testing with a representative sample of the target audience to identify areas for improvement and refine the user experience.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the security of the interactive learning platform by implementing appropriate measures, such as data encryption, secure communication protocols, and user input validation.
dependencies: Implement User Authentication and Progress Tracking

title: Develop Deployment and Maintenance Plan
description: Create a plan for deploying and maintaining the interactive learning platform, including hosting, scalability, and update mechanisms.

title: Create Documentation and Support Resources
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, tutorials, and support resources to assist users in navigating and effectively utilizing the interactive learning platform.

title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing
description: Perform user acceptance testing to ensure the interactive learning platform meets the project requirements and user expectations.
dependencies: Implement User Authentication and Progress Tracking

title: Deploy and Launch Interactive Learning Platform
description: Deploy the interactive learning platform to the production environment and launch it for public access.
